Class ConnectionSpecification

java.lang.Object
  de.must.dataobj.ConnectionSpecification

public class ConnectionSpecification
extends java.lang.Object

The specification needed to create a database connection.

ConnectionSpecification

public ConnectionSpecification(java.lang.String url,
                               java.lang.String driverName,
                               java.lang.String userName,
                               java.lang.String password)
Constructs a connection specification for a direct JDBC connection.

Parameters:
url - the URL of the database to connect to
driverName - the name of the database drive to use
userName - the name of the database user
password - the password of the database user
